mapper.sql: uuid, user_account, user_password, bind_phone, bind_email, nick_name, gender, area, birthday, head_portrait, is_svip, role_id, menu_list, create_by, create_time, last_update_by, last_update_time

select ru.uuid, ru.user_account, ru.user_password, ru.bind_phone, ru.bind_email, nick_name, ru.gender, ru.area, ru.birthday, ru.head_portrait, ru.is_svip, ru.role_id, ru.menu_list, ru.create_by, ru.create_time, ru.last_update_by, ru.last_update_time from roncoo_users as ru
